custom_nodes.description: A collection of little custom nodes for ComfyUI to help in simple/specific tasks

custom_nodes.description: Crosshair guidelines to help align nodes and groups while moving or resizing.

custom_nodes.author: cosmicbuffalo

custom_nodes.description: A mobile-friendly user interface for ComfyUI mounted in parallel with the main frontend at /mobile/.

custom_nodes.author: FearL0rd
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-ParallelAnything
custom_nodes.description: This suite of nodes unlocks high-performance parallel processing in ComfyUI by utilizing **Model Replication**. Unlike standard offloading which moves a single model instance between devices, these nodes create independent replicas of the model on each selected GPU/CPU, allowing for true simultaneous batch processing.

custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI custom nodes for Tencent Youtu-VL vision-language model

custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Demucs-AudioSeparator

custom_nodes.author: franciscotorrado
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Automation
custom_nodes.description: A collection of custom nodes for ComfyUI designed to facilitate complex looping and iteration workflows, specialized in media batch processing.

custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Whiteboard
custom_nodes.description: A simple ComfyUI node that creates a white canvas for freehand drawing and automatically runs inference for sketch-to-image workflows.

custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-GroupBypasser
custom_nodes.description: A small ComfyUI custom node that provides a lightweight bypass for grouped nodes.

custom_nodes.author: ved-gaur
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Sink-Nodes
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI sink nodes that accept inputs and intentionally do nothing, forcing models to load into memory without running inference. (Description by CC)

custom_nodes.author: kreonxv
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-ForgeAPI
custom_nodes.description: Lightweight custom nodes that integrate ComfyUI with ForgeUI-style samplers and provide convenient ControlNet and LoRA stack helpers.

custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-LoraControls
custom_nodes.description: A set of ComfyUI custom nodes to control LoRA (Low-Rank Adaptation) strength programmatically during the sampling process.

custom_nodes.description: A powerful tool for AI dynamic comic creators and scriptwriters extracting up to 4 specific keys from JSON scripts.

custom_nodes.author: ohmygoobness
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-ImageResolutionFixer
custom_nodes.description: A lightweight ComfyUI node that intelligently rounds image dimensions to compatible resolutions using smart reflection mirroring.

custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-SmartScreenshotCleaner
custom_nodes.description: Nodes for removing UI elements from screenshots by detecting and masking icons, buttons, and text. (Description by CC)

custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-T2I_StyleApply
custom_nodes.description: Simple node for ComfyUI that applies a text-to-image (T2I) style to an image or embedding with support for start/end frame control and a weight parameter.

custom_nodes.description: Retro graphics converter node for ComfyUI. Converts modern images to authentic retro computing styles (VGA, EGA, CGA, PC-98) with proper color palettes, dithering, and resolution constraints.

custom_nodes.author: kana112233
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-kaola-ace-step

custom_nodes.description: Simple animated arrows traveling along workflow links (input → output)

custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Simple-Profiler
custom_nodes.description: A pure backend custom node/plugin for ComfyUI that records execution time for each node in a workflow and maximum device usage statistics.

custom_nodes.author: Malkalypse
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-MouseCoords
custom_nodes.description: Display real-time mouse coordinates in graph space. Shows the current mouse position in the top-right corner of the canvas, useful for positioning nodes precisely, debugging layouts, and measuring distances.

custom_nodes.author: MechaBabyAi
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-MechaBaby-NodeLayout
custom_nodes.description: A node layout helper extension for ComfyUI. Assists in arranging and aligning nodes on the canvas without modifying workflow files — all operations are frontend-only.

custom_nodes.author: kreonxv
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Infinity-Canvas
custom_nodes.description: A powerful infinite canvas inpainting extension for ComfyUI inspired by InvokeAI Canvas and Painthua.com, enabling boundless painting and seamless iterative workflows.

custom_nodes.author: kaushiknishchay
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Qwen3-ASR
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI nodes for Qwen3-ASR (0.6B/1.7B) and ForcedAligner. Supports high-accuracy ASR and language identification for 52 languages/dialects, including 22 Chinese dialects and various English accents. Features word-level timestamps, long audio transcription, and VRAM-optimized inference.

custom_nodes.author: SparknightLLC
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-MakeSeamlessTexture
custom_nodes.description: Turn images into seamless textures and build tiled previews. Unique radial mask method available.

custom_nodes.author: 1038lab
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-QwenASR
custom_nodes.description: A lightweight ComfyUI custom node pack for Qwen3-ASR, providing simple speech‑to‑text workflows with local model caching and optional timestamp output. Supports Qwen/Qwen3‑ASR‑1.7B and 0.6B, with HuggingFace/ModelScope download options and clean integration for ComfyUI pipelines.

custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-ugleh-OpenAI
custom_nodes.description: Minimal OpenAI API nodes for ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.description: MeanCache: Training-free inference acceleration for Z-Image Flow Matching models

custom_nodes.author: NidAll
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_PromptStyler
custom_nodes.description: PromptStyler is a custom ComfyUI node that helps you keep your prompts consistent by applying a selected style template to your positive prompt, then outputting CONDITIONING for KSampler.

custom_nodes.author: peter119lee
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-BananaForge

custom_nodes.author: bkpaine1
custom_nodes.title: HALO Debug Pack
custom_nodes.description: AMD ROCm bf16 diagnostic tools for ComfyUI. Fixes black image issues caused by numpy's lack of bfloat16 support. Includes FP32 VAE decode/encode and debug nodes for latent, conditioning, and model inspection. Useful for AMD Strix Halo, older NVIDIA cards, Apple Silicon, and unified memory systems.

custom_nodes.author: shootthesound
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-wan-i2v-control
custom_nodes.description: A user-friendly way to selectively transform parts of your starting image in WAN Image-to-Video generation with advanced masking and person detection.

custom_nodes.author: harishcmgit
custom_nodes.title: comfyui_ds
custom_nodes.description: A custom ComfyUI node that implements advanced document scanning with automatic perspective correction and multiple enhancement options.

custom_nodes.author: errew
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Wireless
custom_nodes.description: A clean, lightweight ComfyUI plugin to transmit data wirelessly between nodes using a global key-value store.

custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-LTXVideo-Extra
custom_nodes.description: Extra nodes for LTX-2 video generation in ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.title: comfyui_smart_character_detailer
custom_nodes.description: Extended ComfyUI node with WD14 Tagger-based image analysis and automatic character identification to apply optimized prompts dynamically. (Description by CC)

custom_nodes.author: engineer6980
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Image-Cipher
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI custom node for image privacy protection using RGB channel independent differential bit-shifting encryption. (Description by CC)

custom_nodes.author: MushroomFleet
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Zero2JSON
custom_nodes.description: ZeroPrompt integration for FLUX2-JSON providing deterministic, profile-based procedural text generation for structured prompt building.

custom_nodes.author: thezveroboy
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-klein4-9multiangle
custom_nodes.description: Klein4&9 MultiAngle Prompt is a ComfyUI node that lets you quickly set the camera angle and distance to the subject in your prompt without typing long descriptions manually.

custom_nodes.author: huyl3-cpu
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-PyTorch210Patcher
custom_nodes.description: Auto-fixes WanVideoModel for PyTorch 2.10.0+ compatibility by automatically patching the model class to work with both PyTorch 2.9.0 and 2.10.0+.

custom_nodes.author: DanPli
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Flux2LatentPresets
custom_nodes.description: A custom ComfyUI node that provides Flux 2–recommended resolution presets for quickly creating empty latents, without manually entering width and height values.

custom_nodes.author: SnJake
custom_nodes.title: SnJake_Sapsan-VFI
custom_nodes.description: SnJake Sapsan-VFI is a custom ComfyUI node for x2 video frame interpolation. It inserts one in-between frame for every input pair, doubling the FPS.

custom_nodes.author: knishika62
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-DualLoraStack
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI custom node that applies the same Lora to two models while sharing a CLIP, supporting up to 6 Lora models with independent strength control. (Description by CC)

custom_nodes.author: Shiba-2-shiba
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Unofficial-HSWQ-QuantizerHSWQ-Quantizer
custom_nodes.description: Unofficial reference implementation of Hybrid Sensitivity Weighted Quantization (HSWQ) for ComfyUI, providing calibration and FP8 conversion nodes for model optimization.

custom_nodes.author: filliptm
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-FL-DiffVSR
custom_nodes.description: FL DiffVSR - Diffusion-based video super-resolution nodes for ComfyUI. Features 4x upscaling with temporal coherence using Stream-DiffVSR for smooth, artifact-free video enhancement. Supports text-guided upscaling, chunked processing for memory efficiency, and automatic model downloading from HuggingFace.

custom_nodes.author: molbal
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-LLM-CLIP
custom_nodes.description: These nodes allow you to use a distilled Qwen3-4B model as your text encoder in Stable Diffusion XL.

custom_nodes.description: A collection of custom nodes for ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.description: Convert to nvfp4, support Z-image-turbo, flux.1 and more

custom_nodes.author: PozzettiAndrea
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-CameraPack
custom_nodes.description: Camera utilities for ComfyUI. Convert between camera formats (DA3 extrinsics/intrinsics to Load3DCamera for Preview3D).

custom_nodes.author: BobRandomNumber
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Calculator
custom_nodes.description: Calculator

custom_nodes.author: D-Ogi
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Attention-Optimizer
custom_nodes.description: Automatically benchmark and optimize attention in diffusion models. 1.5-2x speedup on RTX 4090, up to 4x on video models.

custom_nodes.author: capitan01R
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-ZImageTurbo-FlowSampler
custom_nodes.description: Rectified-flow samplers for Z-Image-Turbo. Clean interpolation formula without sigma division, linear schedulers, higher-order variants. Fixes built-in euler/euler_ancestral instability issues

custom_nodes.author: DevDuckFace
custom_nodes.title: KsamplerDF
custom_nodes.description: A custom ComfyUI node that splits sampling steps between a main sampler and a refiner sampler, with independent denoise control for each phase, with upscalers now

custom_nodes.description: ASDF-style pixel sorting implementation in Python with extended features

custom_nodes.author: xela-io
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-HairDetailer
custom_nodes.description: Comprehensive custom node pack for detecting hair regions, creating precise masks, and enhancing hair details in images with 6 specialized nodes for various hair processing workflows. (Description by CC)

custom_nodes.author: kakachiex2
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-ltx2-efficient
custom_nodes.description: High-performance custom node for LTX2 video generation designed to reduce GPU usage, VRAM requirements, and temperature on consumer GPUs.

custom_nodes.author: SlothHole
custom_nodes.title: Imitatoes
custom_nodes.description: Build a ComfyUI "self-improving" workflow where each render is evaluated by a local vision LLM, which then edits the prompt/parameters and triggers another run.

custom_nodes.author: BobJohnson24
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Flux2-INT8
custom_nodes.description: This node speeds up Flux2, Chroma, Z-Image in ComfyUI by using INT8 quantization, delivering ~2x faster inference on my 3090, but it should work on any NVIDIA GPU with enough INT8 TOPS.

custom_nodes.author: smartvain
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-PromptComment
custom_nodes.description: Custom ComfyUI node providing comment stripping functionality for prompts with multiple marker styles. (Description by CC)

custom_nodes.author: kayorlian
custom_nodes.title: ComfyuiSmartColorMatch
custom_nodes.description: Custom node for ComfyUI that performs color matching between reference and generated images with support for masking.
